__e: You know Doyle there, don't you?
Well, we've got a job to do, Mrs. Holland, and getting men like your husband isn't easy.
This time, Doyle, you stay right next to me.
I don't like it no more than you, but we'd have nothing without Doyle and Milano.
Who the hell are they? I represent Mrs Doyle's English lawyers. We are not at all happy about the way you and your partner have been handling her affairs.
That this person must have taken the gun from here, after everyone had left the saloon, and must have used it to kill Madame Doyle and to attempt to frame Mademoiselle Jackie.
